Package net.java.jddac.jmdi.comm

Provides the communication transport functionality in Java Measurement Dataflow Interface (JMDI).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ByteCoder An interface for transforming bytes for use with the CoderInterface.
CoderInterface Interface to encode and decode objects into/from JDDAC Arg XML.
MessageHandler Interface for objects which receive and inject messages into the transport mechanism.
MessageStore Interface for message storage objects.
ObjectCoder Interface for objects which encode and decode messages from a list of Java objects to an array of bytes.
TransportInterface The interface for communications transports to remote hosts.
 

Class Summary
Base64Coder  
CoderBuffer A buffer object to hold all data and properties associated with a specific CoderInterface encode or decode operation.
CommServlet Receives messages from a probe.
DefaultCoder A Coder block that can be configured for different encoding methods.
HttpTransport HTTP version of the container that orchestrates the various encoding and decoding components within the transport.
HttpTransportJ2me Implements a jddac transport utilizing the J2ME http connection capability.
MessageAttr Attributes for XML encoded network messages.
MultiPartCoder A ByteCoder that handles HTTP multipart forms.
MultiPartCoderWapx  
StreamCoder  
WrapperCoder A ByteCoder that handles HTTP multipart forms.
 

Package net.java.jddac.jmdi.comm Description

Provides the communication transport functionality in Java Measurement Dataflow Interface (JMDI).
